title: Divine Peacock Emerald Haaram: A Timeless Telugu Masterpiece
materials: 22K Gold (సువర్ణము) setting with Hyderabadi Polish. Features meticulously selected round-cut Emeralds (పచ్చ) of vibrant green color and high clarity
interspersed with dazzling CZ stones. Ruby (కెంపు) accents add a touch of regal charm.
features: This exquisite three-layered Haaram showcases a traditional South Indian design featuring intricate peacock motifs (నెమలి డిజైన్) embellished with CZ stones. The central pendant boasts a filigree-like structure, adorned with emerald drops that add graceful movement. The graduated layers create a visually stunning effect, making it a true statement piece. The Hyderabadi polish gives it a lustrous shine.
colors: and sparkling white (CZ stones). This classic combination is highly auspicious in South Indian tradition.
occasions: and traditional Telugu ceremonies such as Seemantham (సీమంతం) or Half-Saree Function (బాలిక సారీ కార్యక్రమం). Also suitable for adding a touch of elegance to formal events.
description: This Haaram embodies the rich cultural heritage of South Indian jewelry making. Its intricate design, combined with high-quality materials and expert craftsmanship, makes it a valuable investment. The peacock motif symbolizes beauty, royalty, and prosperity, making it a meaningful heirloom to pass down through generations. The brilliant CZ stones offer exceptional sparkle, while the emeralds provide a touch of natural elegance.
